scripts.format: pnpm run format-package-json && pnpm run format-prettier-yml && pnpm run format-terraform-fmt && pnpm run format-tflint
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint-tflint && pnpm run lint-terraform-fmt && pnpm run lint-terraform-validate && pnpm run lint-package-json && pnpm run lint-prettier-yml
scripts.prepare-live-alex-c-line: pnpm uninstall alex-c-line && pnpm install --save-dev alex-c-line
scripts.prepare-local-alex-c-line: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'ALEX_C_LINE_PATH=${LOCAL_ALEX_C_LINE_PATH:-../alex-c-line}; pnpm --prefix "$ALEX_C_LINE_PATH" run build && pnpm uninstall alex-c-line && pnpm install --save-dev file:"$ALEX_C_LINE_PATH"'
scripts.prepare-local-eslint-plugin: dotenv -e .env -- sh -c 'ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH=${LOCAL_ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH:-../eslint-plugin}; pnpm --prefix "$ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH" run build && pnpm uninstall @alextheman/eslint-plugin && pnpm install --save-dev file:"$ESLINT_PLUGIN_PATH"'
scripts.use-live-eslint-plugin: pnpm run prepare-live-eslint-plugin && pnpm run lint
scripts.use-local-eslint-plugin: pnpm run prepare-local-eslint-plugin && pnpm run lint
